content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case involving multiple parties the court has granted the application and ordered the dissolution of a hereditary community for a property shares of the property have been transferred to some parties and certain sums of money have been ordered to be paid to various parties the court has acknowledged the property as a legal mortgage and offset the costs of litigation among the parties the court has determined that the property is not conveniently divisible and assigned it to certain parties the court has also determined the amounts due to nonallottee sharers and ordered their payment in this case the claimants have brought a claim against equitalia sud spa and the court has ruled in favor of the claimants ordering the dissolution of the hereditary community the court has ordered the transfer of ownership shares and assigned the obligation to pay certain amounts to other claimants the court has acknowledged a legal mortgage on the property and settled the litigation costs the judgment is final and was decided on june 9 2016
